name: Super Annoying Escort Mission
description:
Alien hordes have invested an interplanetary bank.

Their spawn pods are lingering everywhere!

You are now hired to get the higher ranking employees out of the base alive.

As long as they are alive, they ensure your payment.

Controls

  • Use WSAD keys to move the camera
  • Use Q and E keys to rotate the camera
  • Use mouse wheel to zoom in/out
  • Left click selects a soldier
  • Right click on the ground sends soldier to the location

 Gameplay

  • Try to position your soldiers in a way that they can keep the aliens in check, while escorting the suit to the exit.
  • You can activate checkpoints on your way. These checkpoints are then used as spawn location for new soldiers.
  • Make sure, your soldiers don't die too quickly, or you will run out of funds.
